content: crochetscot- nordman spruce tree nordman spruce tree crochetscot- nordman spruce tree notes this pattern is written in uk terms and is suitable for confident beginners upwards ch1 does not count as a stitch at the start of a row it is your choice whether you work your stitches into the chain stitch itself or into the chain space there is minimal difference to the finished look of the project each block is 30 stitches wide by 21 row long each block weighs 21g and used 61 metres of yarnsmiths create dk in parchment 290m/100g final measurements- each block measures 26cm long by 20cm wide gauge 15 sts x 10 row= 10cmx 10cm however gauge is not crucial for this pattern abbreviations st s - stitch es chain- chain stitch double_crochet- double_crochet treble_crochet- treble_crochet skip- skip a stitch es work all instructions inside the bracket as many times as instructed r- row tools 4 5mm crochet hook or hook size you prefer for dk yarn scissors and yarn needle pattern make 30 foundation treble_crochet stitches uk ch1 turn an alternative start is to chain 31 and add an extra row of treble_crochet starting in the second chain from the hook ch1 turn before starting r1 r1-treble_crochet in each stitch across until the end ch1 turn 30 sts r2-treble_crochet in each stitch ch1 turn 30 sts ch1 turn r3-treble_crochet in the first 14 sts ch1 sk1 treble_crochet x2 treble_crochet in the last 12 sts ch1 turn r4- treble_crochet in the first 13 sts ch1 sk1 treble_crochet x2 treble_crochet in the last 13 sts ch1 turn r5-treble_crochet in the first 14 sts ch1 sk1 treble_crochet x2 treble_crochet in the last 12 sts ch1 turn r6-treble_crochet in the first 13 sts ch1 sk1 treble_crochet x2 treble_crochet in the last 13 sts ch1 turn r7- treble_crochet in the first 14 sts ch1 sk1 treble_crochet x2 treble_crochet in the last 12 sts ch1 turn r8 treble_crochet in the first 4 sts ch1 sk1 treble_crochet x 11 treble_crochet in last 4 sts ch1 turn r9 -treble_crochet in the first 6 sts ch1 sk1 treble_crochet x 1 treble_crochet in the next 16 sts ch1 sk1 treble_crochet x1 treble_crochet in last 4sts ch1 turn r10 -treble_crochet in the first 6 sts ch1 sk1 treble_crochet x1 treble_crochet in next 14 sts ch1 sk1 treble_crochet x1 treble_crochet in the last 6 sts ch1 turn crochetscot- nordman spruce tree r11-treble_crochet in the first 8 sts ch1 sk1 treble_crochet x1 treble_crochet in next 12sts ch1 sk1 treble_crochet x1 treble_crochet in the last 6 sts ch1 turn r12 -treble_crochet in the first 8 sts ch1 sk1 treble_crochet x1 treble_crochet in next 10 sts ch1 sk1 treble_crochet x1 treble_crochet in next 8 sts ch1 turn r13 -treble_crochet in the first 10 sts ch1 sk1 treble_crochet x1 treble_crochet in next 8 sts ch1 sk1 treble_crochet x1 treble_crochet in the last 8 sts ch1 turn r14- treble_crochet in the first 10 sts ch1 sk1 treble_crochet x1 treble_crochet in the next 6 sts ch1 sk1 treble_crochet treble_crochet in
